name: Finger Physics HD
description:
“Finger Physics is AWESOME.” Eros Resmini, VP Openfeint

“Bottom Line: Finger Physics is world-class game at a bargain price.” James Savage, Macworld.com

Finger Physics HD is:
- 32 stages and 300+ levels of awesome with sweet (wait, is this 1994?) HD graphics
- FREE monthly updates of iPad ONLY levels
- 7 game modes including tons of Egg levels – everyone’s favorite
- Exploding blocks
- Magnetized circles, squares and triangles (it's way more fun that it sounds)
- Shapes that float and shapes that don’t
- OpenFeint integration with tons of achievements and global leader board for free play levels.

40+ million fingers have enjoyed Finger Physics on iPhone (yup, you read that right). Now, it's time to give those fingers more room to breathe and spread their proverbial wings with Finger Physics HD. That's right - Finger Physics for iPad is finally here!

If you don't get Finger Physics HD, your fingers WILL go on strike. "Yea, right", you say? Don't say we didn't warn you.
